title: saakEtha nagara naata
sahitya:
sAkEta nagara nAtha shrIkAnta jagannAtha

anupallavi

lOkEsha cidvilAsa lOkAvana catura mAm pAhi
dEvadEva munijana hita surapatinuta shubhada carita
dasarata sukha janakajAramaNa dEvaripuNA sajana

caraNam

rAjitAmara pAla rAmacandra bhUpAla rAjarAja vandita caraNa yugaLa dIna pAla ina
rAjavamsha ratna sadAshiva kavinuta jita sapatna dasharatha suta janakajA ramaNa dEva ripu nAshacaNa
